claims.sentence: Patients who died (n = 4), who no longer had access to their EHR portal (n = 20), or who replied to the invitation requesting to be removed from the research pool (n =15) were excluded from analyses.3 This resulted in a total sample of 1,561 participants (see Figure 1 for CONSORT flow diagram).
Patients in Cohort 2b (n = 536) were then randomly assigned to one of the four shortened message conditions ($5, $10, $20, coaching; see Figure 1 for CONSORT flow diagram).
